column3: This looks like it will be an instant crash if you put a P2SH address in the field.

@gmaxwell Thanks for reviewing and clarifying that the old code does not assume `addr.GetKeyID(keyid)` being `true`.\n\nI've now changed to `if (!valid || !model->havePrivKey(keyid)) { â€¦ }` for the unknown change address code path - looks good? :-)
I think the code there just doesn't correctly handle p2sh keys in general. Probably needs a more extensive fixup than that, though the assert seems clearly not right. :)
@TheBlueMatt Thanks for the notification! @dooglus PR is the better choice. Closing this PR! :-)
